name: Too Far Too Furious
description:
The sun is shining, the birds are singing; it's the perfect day for an RC Car Race with your friends. Unfortunately your remote is an older model and has a way shorter antenna, but there's a way you can still win this race.
Keep following your car so it stays in range of your control signal.

Too Far Too Furious is a classic top down racing game with a little twist. You can only keep controlling your RC Car if your character stays in range of it.

You control the Red car and the Red person
Use WASD to control the RC Car
Use the left mouse button to guide your character
Use R to Reset to the main menu while in game
